TopicTitle: How Did You Name Your Space Company/Corporation/Industry?

Articles.Content:
Mine is the "Kerbal states aerospace division" (KSAD) I named it so because i like military related things (especially the air force) and space things. Its basically a cross between NASA and the air force in my KSP world. Studding space to help benefit Kerbins technologies and understanding of space. While handing over any developments  of interest to the air force for the defense of the united kerbal states.

I imagine the flag of the division to be like this

But i just use the stock "retro" flag

1 minute ago, Avery616 said:

I imagine the flag of the division to be like this

But i just use the stock "retro" flag

 

Cool flag, I'd use that!

"Xyphos" has been a long-standing "handle" or "alias" of mine dating all the way back to the days of UseNet, AOL and dial-up modems. 

it's only natural for me to coin "Xyphos Aerospace Industries" while learing about aerospace engineering and astrophysics.

Edited August 13, 2017 by Xyphos

I either use ESE (Electron Space Agency)

KSA (Kerbin Space Administration)

or, the one I'm using now, The KSA's KSP (The Kerbin Space Administration's Kerbal Space Program)
